args.content:
import Mathlib

/- Prove that the polynomial x^2 - sqrt(2) is irreducible over Z[sqrt(2)].
   We assume Z[sqrt(2)] is a UFD. -/

open Polynomial

variable {R : Type _} [CommRing R]

/-- In Z[sqrt(2)] we consider the polynomial X^2 - sqrt(2). We state that it is irreducible. -/
theorem Dummit_Foote_exercise_9_4_9 :
  let K := (AdjoinRoot (X ^ 2 - C (sqrt (2 : Int)))) in
  (X ^ 2 - C (sqrt (2 : Int)) : Polynomial K).Irreducible := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Polynomial

/-- The ring Z[sqrt(2)] as an adjoined root of X^2 - 2 over Z. -/
def Z_sqrt2 : Type := AdjoinRoot (X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int)

/-- The polynomial X^2 - sqrt(2) in Z[sqrt(2)][X] is irreducible. -/
theorem Dummit_Foote_exercise_9_4_9 :
  Irreducible (X ^ 2 - C (AdjoinRoot.root (X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int)) : Polynomial Z_sqrt2) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Polynomial

/-- The ring Z[sqrt(2)] as an adjoined root of X^2 - 2 over Z. -/
def Z_sqrt2 : Type := AdjoinRoot (X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int)

instance : CommRing Z_sqrt2 := AdjoinRoot.instCommRing (X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int)

/-- The polynomial X^2 - sqrt(2) in Z[sqrt(2)][X] is irreducible. -/
theorem Dummit_Foote_exercise_9_4_9 :
  Irreducible (X ^ 2 - C (AdjoinRoot.root (X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int)) : Polynomial Z_sqrt2) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Polynomial

noncomputable section

/-- The ring Z[sqrt(2)] as an adjoined root of X^2 - 2 over Z. -/
def Z_sqrt2 : Type := AdjoinRoot (X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int)

/-- The polynomial X^2 - sqrt(2) in Z[sqrt(2)][X] is irreducible. -/
theorem Dummit_Foote_exercise_9_4_9 :
  Irreducible (X ^ 2 - C (AdjoinRoot.root (X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int)) : Polynomial Z_sqrt2) := by sorry

end noncomputable

import Mathlib

open Polynomial

noncomputable def Z_sqrt2 : Type := AdjoinRoot (X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int)

theorem Dummit_Foote_exercise_9_4_9 :
  Irreducible (X ^ 2 - C (AdjoinRoot.root (X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int)) : Polynomial Z_sqrt2) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- The polynomial X^2 - √2 is irreducible over Z[√2] = AdjoinRoot (X^2 - 2) -/
theorem Dummit_Foote_exercise_9_4_9 :
  Irreducible (Polynomial.X ^ 2 - Polynomial.C (AdjoinRoot.root (Polynomial.X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int)) :
    Polynomial (AdjoinRoot (Polynomial.X ^ 2 - 2 : Polynomial Int))) := by sorry
